content: I've been trying to take shorter showers, but it's funny, I only just cleaned my bathroom mirror last Sunday and it was getting all foggy and streaked after every shower - I think it's been like that for three weeks now. Anyway, back to water usage, I think I'll try to check my water meter to see how much water I'm actually using. Do you have any tips on how to reduce water waste in the rest of the bathroom, like with the sink and toilet?
